page.title: 18Living In A Lighthouse
page.content: A family recently moved into {North {Low Lighthouse.}They told us about { {living}in a lighthouse.They moved into the area to get away from {noise}.They liked watching the {river}and the { {boats }on it from the top of the lighthouse.There was also a good { {view.}Although the area is {isolated} they still get a lot of {visitors}. They have contact with the { {smallholding }and buy {dairy products} such as {duck eggs}etc. One thing they dislike is the {refinery smell.}The interviewees {disagree}on whether the area is different to where they used to live. They go to the {"New Inn"}for a drink and a meal.They both work locally,although outside our area.One of the problems is the{bumpy road}to the lighthouse,but they hope to{ {improve}it in the near future.
